Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Mundhinavaigalukkoththa Irandu Karpalagaigalai Vettikkondu, Malaiyinmel Eri, Ennidaththil Vaa; Oru Marappettiyaiyum Seyvaayaaga.
2 nee Udaiththuppotta Mundhina Palagaigalil Irundha Vaarththaigalai Naan Andhap Palagaigalil Ezhudhuven; Nee Avaigalaip Pettiyile Vaippaayaaga Endraar.
3 appadiye Naan Seeththim Maraththinaal Oru Pettiyaich Seydhu, Mundhinavaigalukkoththa Irandu Karpalagaigalai Vetti, Avaigalai En Kaiyile Eduththukkondu Malaiyil Erinen.

4 munne Sabaikoodivandha Naalil Karththar Malaiyil Akkini Naduvilirundhu Ungalukku Vilambina Paththuk Karpanaigalaiyum Avar Mun Ezhudhiyirundha Piragaaram Andhap Palagaigalil Ezhudhi, Avaigalai Ennidaththil Thandhaar.
5 appozhudhu Naan Thirumbi Malaiyilirundhu Irangi, Andhap Palagaigalai Naan Seydha Pettiyile Vaiththen; Karththar Enakkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Avaigal Adhile Vaiththirukkiradhu.

6 pinbu Isravel Puththirar Peneyaakkaanukkatuththa Peroththileyirundhu Moseraavukkup Pirayaanampanninaargal; Ange Aaron Mariththu Adakkampannappattaan; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaar Aasaariyanaanaan.
7 angeyirundhu Kudhkodhaavukkum, Kudhkodhaavilirundhu Aarugilulla Naadaagiya Yodhpaaththukkum Pirayaanampanninaargal.

8 akkaalaththile Karththarudaiya Udanbadikkaip Pettiyaich Sumappadharkum, Innaalvaraikkum Nadandhuvarugiradhupola, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyile Nindru Avarukku Aaraadhanai Seyvadharkum, Avar Naamaththaik Kondu Aaseervadhippadharkum, Karththar Leviyin Koththiraththaip Piriththeduththaar.
9 aagaiyaal Levikku Avan Sagodhararode Pangum Sudhandharamum Illai; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avanukkuch Sonnabadi, Karththare Avanukkuch Sudhandharam.
10 naan Mundhina Piragaaramaagave Naarpadhunaal Iravum Pagalum Malaiyil Irundhen; Karththar Andha Muraiyum En Mandraattaik Kettu, Unnai Azhikkaamal Vittaar.

11 karththar Ennai Nokki: Naan Koduppen Endru Avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyitta Dhesaththil Avargal Poi Adhaidh Sudhandhariththuk Kollumbadi, Nee Ezhundhu, Janaththirku Munbaagap Pirayaanappattup Po Endraar.

12 ippozhudhum Isravele, Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Avar Vazhigalilellaam Nadandhu, Avaridaththil Anbukoorndhu, Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Un Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraich Seviththu,

13 naan Indru Unakkuk Karpikkira Karththarudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Avarudaiya Kattalaigalaiyum Unakku Nanmaiyundaagumbadi Kaikkollavendum Enbadhaiye Allaamal, Vere Edhai Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnidaththil Ketkiraar.
14 idho, Vaanangalum Vaanaadhivaanangalum, Boomiyum Adhilulla Yaavum, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiyavaigal.

15 aanaalum Karththar Un Pidhaakkalmel Anbukoorumporuttu Avargalidaththil Piriyam Vaiththu, Avargalukkup Pin Avargaludaiya Sandhadhiyaagiya Ungalai, Innaalil Irukkirabadiye, Sagala Jaadhigalukkullum Thamakkendru Therindhukondaar.
16 aagaiyaal Neengal Ini Ungal Pidariyaik Kadinappaduththaamal, Ungal Irudhayaththin Nuniththolai Viruththasedhanampannungal.

17 ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Dhevaadhi Dhevanum, Karththaadhi Karththarum, Magaththuvamum Vallamaiyum Bayangaramumaana Dhevanumaayirukkiraar; Avar Patchapaadham Pannugiravarum Alla, Paridhaanam Vaangugiravarum Alla.
18 avar Thikkatra Pillaikkum Vidhavaikkum Niyaayanjeygiravarum, Anniyanmel Anbuvaiththu Avanukku Annavasthiram Kodukkiravarumaai Irukkiraar.
19 neengalum Egipthudhesaththil Anniyaraayirundhapadiyaal, Anniyaraich Snegippeergalaaga.
20 un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Bayandhu, Avaraich Seviththu, Avaraip Patrikkondirundhu, Avarudaiya Naamaththaikkondu Aanaiyiduvaayaaga.
21 avare Un Pugazhchchi; Un Kan Kanda Indhap Periya Bayangaramaana Kaariyangalai Unnidaththil Seydha Un Dhevan Avare.
22 un Pidhaakkal Ezhuvadhuperaai Egipthukkup Ponaargal; Ippozhudho Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnaith Thiratchiyile Vaanaththin Natchaththirangalaippolaakkinaar.
